content.question: According to the passage, Aurelius

choices.label: tells the senate about charges the Bithynians want to bring against the proconsul
is accused by the Bithynians, who deny him witnesses and demand an investigation
asks the senate to investigate the Bithynians based on the testimony of his witnesses
brings charges against the Bithynians, who refuse to defend themselves with witnesses

content.answer: is accused by the Bithynians, who deny him witnesses and demand an investigation
